abstract: Keeping Score column asserts considerable accomplishments of wide receiver Terrell Owens are overshadowed by his sometimes off-putting personality, fact that may have kept him out of 2016 Pro Football Hall of Fame class.

headline.print_headline: Antics Aside, Owens Stands Out for His Achievements
headline.main: Antics Aside, Terrell Owens Stands Out for His Achievements

snippet: Owens, who failed to gain election on his first time on the Pro Football Hall of Fame ballot, is often met with a great deal of vitriol, despite his dominance as a wide receiver.
lead_paragraph: Owens, who failed to gain election on his first time on the Pro Football Hall of Fame ballot, is often met with a great deal of vitriol, despite his dominance as a wide receiver.
